participant_abstract.sent: I introduced the upcoming project to the team member after we introduced ourselves to one another.
We acquainted ourselves with various tools available to us and then dicussed how we would go about approaching this design problem.
There was then a brainstorming session about what we'd do for this project and what we wanted from it.

participant_actions.sent: The UID and ID will research basic functional possibilities of a remote control.
I'll keep track of the overall vision of this project and try to find the balance between extremities of the project.
The ME will look into what customers/demographic we'll market this project to.

participant_decisions.sent: The team is now working on the BASIC necessary functions of the remote control and what is expected at a basic level .
Research is being done on what is possible to include.
We're considering the tradeoffs between cost and features.

participant_problems.sent: No problems aside from the inevitable engineering tradeoffs of speed/quality/cost were encountered.
The teams seems to be working well together.
